greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n + (sum of primes factors of n taken with repetition).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a075254 n = n + a001414 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 27 2012
(PARI) a(n) = my(f = factor(n)); n += sum(k=1, #f~, f[k,1]*f[k,2]); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 22 2017
(MAGMA) [n eq 1 select 1 else (&+[p[1]*p[2]: p in Factorization(n)]) + n: n in [1..80]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 10 2019
(Sage) [n + sum(factor(n)[j][0]*factor(n)[j][1] for j in range(0, len(factor(n)))) for n in range(1, 80)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 10 2019
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Sep 10 2002
